badges.name: First Responder
badges.description: Awarded for being the first to respond to an emergency request.

badges.name: Good Samaritan
badges.description: Awarded for consistently offering help to those in need.

badges.name: Lifesaver
badges.description: Awarded for successfully assisting in saving a life.

badges.name: Guardian Angel
badges.description: Awarded for providing critical assistance during a life-threatening situation.

badges.name: Heroic Helper
badges.description: Awarded for going above and beyond to assist in emergencies.

badges.name: Rapid Responder
badges.description: Awarded for responding to emergencies within 2 minutes.

badges.name: Community Champion
badges.description: Awarded for being a top helper in your local community.

badges.name: Safety Sentinel
badges.description: Awarded for actively ensuring the safety of others.

badges.name: Rescue Ranger
badges.description: Awarded for assisting in rescue operations.

badges.name: Support Specialist
badges.description: Awarded for providing exceptional support during emergencies.

badges.name: Emergency Expert
badges.description: Awarded for handling 5 or more emergencies with expertise.

badges.name: Helping Hand
badges.description: Awarded for assisting in 3 or more emergencies.

badges.name: Alert Ally
badges.description: Awarded for being vigilant and reporting incidents promptly.

badges.name: On-Call Hero
badges.description: Awarded for being available and responsive during critical times.

badges.name: Volunteer Virtuoso
badges.description: Awarded for exceptional volunteer contributions.

badges.name: Crisis Commander
badges.description: Awarded for managing high-pressure situations effectively.

badges.name: Aid Advocate
badges.description: Awarded for promoting and supporting aid initiatives.

badges.name: Rescue Rockstar
badges.description: Awarded for outstanding performance in rescue operations.

badges.name: Patron of Protection
badges.description: Awarded for being a dedicated protector of the community.

badges.name: Beacon of Hope
badges.description: Awarded for inspiring hope and positivity during emergencies.
